parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of block instances in this sketch

title: ISketch.IGetSketchBlockInstances
description: Gets the block instances in this sketch (i.e., the sketch under which the block instances are displayed in the FeatureManager design tree).

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of block instances in this sketch

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array containing the block instances in this sketch VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Call
ISketch::GetSketchBlockInstanceCount
before calling this method to get the number of block instances in this sketch.
See
Block Definitions and Block Instances
for details.
